dcterms:description: The NCBI disease corpus consists of 793 PubMed titles and abstracts, each containing manually annotated disease mentions, separated into training, development, and test sets.
dcterms:title: NCBI disease corpus (NCBID)

dcterms:creator: Jiao Li

dcterms:description: BC5CDR provides manually annotated disease and chemical entities, which are mapped into MEDIC and comparative toxicogenomics database (CTD) chemical dictionaries.
dcterms:title: BioCreative V Chemical Disease Relation (BC5CDR)

dcterms:creator: Sunil Mohan
Donghui Li
dcterms:description: MedMentions is a large biomedical corpus annotated with UMLS concepts, providing over 4,000 PubMed abstracts and over 350,000 mentions linked to concepts in the UMLS.
dcterms:title: MedMentions
